name: tubetrack
description: YouTube learning progress tracker with playlist import, video watching, note-taking, and analytics

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.test: npm run test -w shared && npm run test -w server && npm run test -w client
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w shared && npm run lint -w server && npm run lint -w client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w shared && npm run lint:fix -w server && npm run lint:fix -w client
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w shared && npm run type-check -w server && npm run type-check -w client
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules shared/node_modules client/dist server/dist shared/dist

author: TubeTrack Team
